titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Gilliam Schenck election notice 1974.233
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:19:34 +0000.

did.abstract: An election notice stating that Gilliam Schenck was voted to the position of Kings County Treasurer, dated 1879.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1974.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Gilliam Schenck election notice, 1974.233, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
